This bug has sucked enough for me to uninstall 4.03 and return to 4.02.

You can no longer paste in text into the script editor (with the exception of text blocks).

Due to my horrid spelling I have gotten into the practice of typing all my text into a word processor with spell check and then copying and pasting it into Quest.  To be safe I was doing any text that someone would ever see...error messages...five word sentences...anything.  

Now I can not do that... it sucks...allot....to the point that I might not use the program anymore if there is not a work around....

Any ideas?

Dr. Froth
